A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ takes risks with characters and plot that are unexpected yet fitting to the Star Wars universe. There are elements that pay homage to the OT while still driving the story in new and exciting ways. Mark Hamill gives a stellar performance and Carrie's is a fitting farewell. There's darkness and levity to the film\, and - aside from some misplaced humor - this film is Star Wars\, through and through\, and I can't wait to see it again.
